F_DISTANCE_OBJECT_OBJECT.question: What is the distance between the geometrical centers of <OBJECT_1> and the <OBJECT_2>?

F_DISTANCE_OBJECT_GROUND.question: What is the distance between the lowest point of the <OBJECT> and the nearest ground element?

F_DISTANCE_OBJECT_CAMERA_DISTANCE.question: What is the distance between the geometrical center of the <OBJECT> and the camera?

F_DISTANCE_CLOSEST_OBJECT_OBJECT.question: What is the distance between the geometrical center of the <OBJECT> and its closest object?

F_SIZE_OBJECT.question: What is the volume of the <OBJECT>?

F_SIZE_OBJECT_BIGGER.question: Which single object has the biggest volume?

F_SIZE_OBJECT_SMALLER.question: Which single object has the smallest volume?

F_KINEMATICS_SPEED_OBJECT.question: What is the speed of the <OBJECT>?

F_KINEMATICS_FASTEST_OBJECT_SPEED.question: What is the speed of the fastest object?

F_KINEMATICS_ACCEL_OBJECT.question: What is the acceleration of the <OBJECT>?

F_KINEMATICS_DISTANCE_TRAVELED_INTERVAL.question: Considering the geometrical center of the object, how far has the <OBJECT> traveled between during the sequence?

F_MASS_OBJECT.question: What is the mass of the <OBJECT>?

F_MASS_HEAVIEST_OBJECT.question: Which single object has the greatest mass?

F_MASS_LIGHTEST_OBJECT.question: Which single object has the least mass?

F_MASS_COMPARE_OBJECTS.question: Is the mass of the <OBJECT_1> greater than the mass of the <OBJECT_2>?
